byline.original: By MICHAEL SCHWIRTZ and MICHAEL WINERIP

abstract: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio visits Rikers jail complex for second time in three months to outline 14- point plan to curb violence among inmates and contraband smuggling; visit comes at time of mounting concern over brutality by guards at Rikers, topic the de Blasio avoids during visit.
lead_paragraph: Many proposals in Mayor Bill de Blasio’s plan have already been underway, showing just how difficult the task of reforming the jail complex is proving to be.

headline.main: De Blasio, at Rikers, Unveils a Plan to Reduce Violence and Smuggling
headline.print_headline: De Blasio, at Rikers, Unveils a Plan to Reduce Violence and Smuggling
